verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You Deserve The Glory, And The Honor;
Lord We Lift Our Hearts In Worship, As We Lift Your Holy Name!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
For You Are Great!
You Do Miracles So Great,

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
There is No One Else Like You!
(Repeat)

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: There is No One Else Like You!
